name: Edgemoor Hits a High Note
description: The power of music can cross cultural boundaries, connect people from all socio-economic backgrounds and bridge generations. When singer Andy Nahas offered to visit Edgemoor Skilled Nursing Facility in Santee to perform for clients, administrators jumped at the opportunity.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Reading Time:  < 1 minuteThe power of music is undeniable. It can cross cultural boundaries, connect people from all socio-economic backgrounds and bridge generations. For older adults, music also has a positive effect on mental health, physical health, and social functioning regardless of a person’s ability. It can enhance memory, communication and help build connections to others. When singer Andy Nahas offered to visit Edgemoor Skilled Nursing Facility in Santee to perform for clients, administrators jumped at the opportunity. The result was magical.
